signals.title: DeepSeek releases breakthrough AI training method mHC for efficient model scaling
signals.summary: Chinese AI startup DeepSeek published Manifold-Constrained Hyper-Connections (mHC) training method in January 2026, described as a striking breakthrough for scaling models without instability at minimal cost. This follows their R1 model release that matched ChatGPT o1 at a fraction of the cost.

signals.title: CES 2026: Physical AI and humanoid robots dominate with 40 companies showcasing
signals.summary: CES 2026 (Jan 6-9) marked physical AI as the dominant theme with 40 companies mentioning humanoid robots. NVIDIA unveiled Cosmos and GR00T models for robot learning, while Boston Dynamics introduced production-ready Atlas. McKinsey estimates general-purpose robotics could reach $370B by 2040.

signals.title: D-Wave announces acquisition of Quantum Circuits Inc. for $550M to accelerate quantum computing
signals.summary: D-Wave announced on Jan 7, 2026 acquisition of Quantum Circuits Inc. for $550M ($300M stock + $250M cash) with initial dual-rail system planned for general availability in 2026. D-Wave also demonstrated scalable on-chip cryogenic control for gate-model qubits, industry first.

signals.title: IBM predicts quantum advantage verification by end of 2026 with 7,500-gate systems
signals.summary: IBM anticipates first verified quantum advantage cases by end of 2026, with future Nighthawk iterations delivering up to 7,500 gates. Industry analysts predict shift from experimental to commercially relevant applications as quantum computing hits turning point in 2026.

signals.title: 양자컴퓨터 2026년 상용화 원년, IBM '강한 양자 우위' 선언
signals.summary: IBM은 CES 2026에서 2026년 말까지 '강한 양자 우위(strong quantum advantage)' 실현을 공식 예측했으며, 양자컴퓨터가 슈퍼컴을 넘어서는 원년이 될 것으로 전망. 글로벌 시장은 2025년 35.2억 달러에서 2026년 47억 달러로 성장 예상.

signals.title: NVIDIA introduces Cosmos physical AI models and announces Vera Rubin AI superchip in production
signals.summary: At CES 2026, NVIDIA released Cosmos and GR00T open models for robot learning, Isaac Lab-Arena for evaluation, and OSMO edge-to-cloud framework. Announced Vera Rubin next-gen AI superchip platform in full production, plus Siemens partnership for Industrial AI Operating System.

signals.title: CRISPR epigenetic editing breakthrough: gene activation without DNA cutting
signals.summary: UNSW Sydney researchers developed new CRISPR-based epigenetic editing that switches genes on/off without cutting DNA by removing chemical tags. This safer approach for genetic diseases like Sickle Cell represents major advance. CRISPR Therapeutics expects CTX460 clinical trial mid-2026.

signals.title: Neuralink plans high-volume brain-computer interface production with automated surgery in 2026
signals.summary: Neuralink announced plans to begin high-volume production and fully automated surgical procedures for brain-computer interface devices by 2026. 12-20 people with severe paralysis received implants by Sept 2025. Competitors Paradromics and Synchron also expanding clinical trials internationally.

signals.title: FCC approves SpaceX plan to deploy 7,500 additional Starlink satellites, total 15,000
signals.summary: FCC approved SpaceX deployment of 7,500 more Gen2 Starlink satellites on Jan 10, 2026, bringing total to 15,000 worldwide. Starlink reached 9M subscribers in Dec 2025 (adding 4.6M in 2025). Revenue projected $15B in 2025, $22-24B in 2026. Starlink Direct-to-Cell now live for unmodified 5G phones.

signals.title: Commonwealth Fusion Systems SPARC reactor targets first plasma in 2026
signals.summary: Commonwealth Fusion Systems plans to complete SPARC commissioning by end of 2025 and generate first plasma in 2026, representing major near-term fusion milestone. Company raised $2B+ and is building commercial fusion campus outside Boston. 89% of private fusion companies expect grid electricity by end of 2030s.

signals.title: AI agents market to surge from $7.8B to $52B by 2030, 40% enterprise adoption in 2026
signals.summary: Agentic AI market projected to surge from $7.8B today to $52B by 2030. Gartner predicts 40% of enterprise applications will embed AI agents by end of 2026, up from <5% in 2025. January 2026 marks pivotal shift from experimental prototypes to production-ready autonomous systems.

signals.title: LongBio longevity biotech positioned for breakout at JP Morgan 2026 conference
signals.summary: LongGame Longevity Biotech Demo Day took place Jan 9, 2026 ahead of JP Morgan conference, signaling convergence of longevity with mainstream biotech. Investment in longevity sector grew from $3.2B in 2019 to $8.5B by 2024. Longevity now in 'investable era' with serious capital backing.

signals.title: AI can now design proteins and DNA, scientists warn biosecurity rules urgently needed
signals.summary: AI technology can now design entirely novel synthetic molecules from DNA to proteins, with relative novices able to design using open source AI software. Scientists calling for biosecurity frameworks before technology spreads further. Represents dual-use breakthrough with safety implications.

signals.title: TSMC revenue beats estimates, AI chip demand outstrips supply through 2026
signals.summary: TSMC reported Jan 9, 2026 revenue topping estimates with sustained AI spending. 2025 revenue hit record $113B (36% YoY increase). AI chip demand consistently outstripping supply. CoWoS capacity reaching 120-130K wafers/month by end 2026, but unlikely to loosen constraints. Nvidia and Apple secured large capacity blocks through end 2026.

signals.title: Cellular agriculture moves beyond startup phase to public-sector institutional backing
signals.summary: At 2026 Tufts Future Food Innovation Day (January), experts noted cellular agriculture shifting from startup economics to public-sector and institutional backing. Growing public investment globally as food security becomes effective frame. UK approved cultivated chicken for pet food 2025, human approvals expected 2-3 years.

signals.title: Textile recycling technologies to process 8M tons waste annually by 2030, up from <1M today
signals.summary: 2026 textile recycling landscape represents maturation toward true circular material cycles with chemical depolymerization, fiber regeneration, automated sorting. Industry projections show technologies demonstrated in 2026 will process 8M+ tons waste annually by 2030 vs <1M tons today.

signals.title: Global venture capital deployment expected to increase 10% to high $400B in 2026
signals.summary: Global VC deployment expected to increase to high $400B mark in 2026, implying 10% increase. 2025 ended at $339.4B across 16,709 deals. American VCs spent 65.4% of deal money on AI/ML in 2025. OpenAI and Anthropic alone captured 14% of global venture investment, with 79% of AI funding going to US-based companies.

signals.title: Goldman Sachs forecasts 2.8% global GDP growth in 2026, recession probability drops to 30%
signals.summary: Goldman Sachs projects global GDP increase of 2.8% in 2026 (vs consensus 2.5%). Recession probability over next 12 months fallen to 30% from 40%. US growth projected at above-trend 2.2%. Recent tariff wave has not triggered global trade collapse, supported by corporate hedging and supply chain reconfigurations.

signals.title: Enterprise AI spending to increase in 2026 but consolidate to fewer vendors
signals.summary: Overwhelming majority of enterprise-focused VCs predict enterprises will increase AI budgets in 2026, but concentrate spending with fewer contracts. 2026 will be year enterprises start consolidating investments and picking winners. Shift from AI wrappers to infrastructure already happened, making survival difficult for wrapper companies.

signals.title: Seed-stage AI startups receive 42% higher valuations than non-AI peers in 2026
signals.summary: Seed-stage AI startups typically receive valuations 42% higher than non-AI peers. Series A median values exceed $50M in 2025, Series B median valuations surged to ~$143M. VC opportunity set is bifurcated with strong AI-driven companies attracting capital while others struggle.

signals.title: Space economy moving toward $1 trillion valuation by 2040, CES highlights growth
signals.summary: Space economy moving toward $1T valuation with JPMorgan calculating growth from $447B to over $1T by 2040. CES 2026 highlighted symbiotic relationship between consumer electronics and space economy. SpaceX projected revenue $15B in 2025, increasing to $22-24B in 2026, mostly from Starlink.

signals.title: 2026 will bring widespread job shifts as AI agents automate work, labor analysts warn
signals.summary: Labor analysts say 2026 could be when AI technology begins reshaping job market in ways Americans actually feel. 2026 called 'year of agents' as AI expands from productivity to automating work itself. WEF estimates AI will replace 85M jobs by 2026. Most-exposed: entry-level coders, call centers, accountants, bookkeepers.

signals.title: AI/ML engineer salaries projected 4.1% increase in 2026, outpacing tech sector average
signals.summary: Salaries for AI/ML Engineers and Data Scientists projected 4.1% increase in 2026, significantly outpacing general tech sector average. Central theme for compensation is premiumization of AI-adjacent skills. Salary no longer tied strictly to job title but to proximity to AI infrastructure and data management.

signals.title: UNEZA Alliance pledges $148B annually for renewable energy, transmission, and storage post-COP30
signals.summary: Following COP30, UNEZA Alliance pledged annual commitments of $66B for renewable energy and $82B for transmission and storage. UN Climate Chief noted renewable energy investments now outpace fossil fuels 2:1. COP31 scheduled Nov 9-20, 2026 in Antalya, Turkey with focus on tripling renewable capacity by 2030.

signals.title: IRENA annual assembly Jan 10-12, 2026 to announce progress on tripling renewable energy
signals.summary: International Renewable Energy Agency gathering ministers Jan 10-12, 2026 at Abu Dhabi headquarters for annual assembly. Organization will announce new insights on whether world is on track to meet COP28 goal of tripling renewable energy capacity by 2030.

signals.title: GE Vernova debuts 1,500-tonne/year commercial DAC unit in 2026, scalable to 50,000+ tonnes
signals.summary: GE Vernova plans to debut 1,500-tonne-per-year commercial DAC unit in 2026 as first true product in their portfolio. System designed with modularity and industrial scalability potentially scaling to 50,000+ tonnes. Stratos facility in West Texas (500K tonnes/year capacity) expected full operation mid-2026.

signals.title: Direct air capture industry growing with 20+ facilities operational worldwide by 2026
signals.summary: More than 20 direct air capture facilities operating worldwide by 2026. Climeworks will deliver 50,000+ tons verified carbon removal credits per year by 2026. Leading projects now capture carbon for <$300/ton, sharp drop from early pilot costs. Global CCUS market projected $9.6B by end of 2029.

signals.title: 한국 기후에너지환경부 2026년 예산 19.2조원, 재생에너지 지원 98.6% 증가
signals.summary: 한국 기후에너지환경부 2026년 예산 19.2조원으로 2025년 대비 9.9% 증가. 재생에너지 금융 지원이 2025년 3,263억원에서 2026년 6,480억원으로 98.6% 증가. AI 기반 분산전력망 산업 육성에 2,171억원 신규 투입, 주민참여형 ESS 설치 지원 984억원 포함.

signals.title: Bangladesh and Pakistan set renewable energy records with solar installations
signals.summary: Bangladesh off-grid home solar installations set global record, enabling rapid rural electrification. Pakistan's massive solar panel and battery purchases led country to abandon natural gas as strategic fuel. Represents significant shift in developing nations' energy strategies.

signals.title: Trump administration issues executive order preempting state AI laws, forms litigation task force
signals.summary: Trump administration's policy to sustain US global AI dominance through minimally burdensome national framework. Attorney General directed to establish AI Litigation Task Force within 30 days to challenge state AI laws inconsistent with federal policy. Targets laws like Colorado's algorithmic discrimination legislation.

signals.title: US-China relations enter 2026 with fragile trade truce, tech war intensifying over AI chips
signals.summary: US-China relations entering 2026 with paradox: trade thawing in soybeans/metals while tech war over AI chips and Taiwan military balance hardening. China reducing import duties on 935 items from Jan 1, focusing on advanced tech, renewable energy, healthcare. Tech co-dependence may expand driven by easing controls and Chinese open-source AI models.

signals.title: US plans new semiconductor tariffs on China starting June 2027 after Section 301 investigation
signals.summary: US plans to install new tariffs on semiconductors from China starting June 23, 2027 following Section 301 investigation. Tariffs will cover 18 product categories including various integrated circuits and components. Represents continued escalation of semiconductor technology competition.

signals.title: EU AI Act transparency rules take effect August 2026, Digital Omnibus may extend high-risk timeline
signals.summary: EU AI Act transparency rules take effect August 2026. Digital Omnibus proposals may extend high-risk processing timeline from Aug 2026 to Dec 2027. Each member state must establish AI regulatory sandbox by Aug 2, 2026. Code of Practice on AI-generated content marking/labeling finalization expected June 2026.

signals.title: EU to publish first-ever Fusion Strategy by early 2026 shaping commercial fusion landscape
signals.summary: EU's first-ever Fusion Strategy planned for publication by early 2026, which could shape commercial fusion landscape. Represents policy framework for transition from ITER research to demonstration and commercial fusion power plants. Critical for Europe's energy independence and climate goals.

signals.title: Trump expected to visit China in April 2026, potential turning point in bilateral relations
signals.summary: Trump expected to visit China in April 2026 alongside anticipated 2026 leader-level meetings at G-20 and APEC summits. Past decade of 'experimenting with competition' could give way to something new. Interactions serve core function of setting boundaries in managed competition framework.

signals.title: Gen Z: 86% striving to reduce screen time, 2026 becomes year of digital minimalism
signals.summary: 86% of Gen Z across US and Europe striving to reduce screen time. 2026 is when digital minimalism stops being niche and becomes mainstream movement. 81% of Gen Z workers wish it was easier to disconnect from digital devices and believe digital detoxes should become routine workplace practice.

signals.title: One-week social media detox reduces anxiety by 16.1%, depression by 24.8% in studies
signals.summary: Scientific study found one-week social media detox observed 16.1% reduction in anxiety symptoms and 24.8% decrease in depression symptoms. More people experimenting with phone-free hours, social media breaks, guided by clinicians' advice that consuming less noise significantly reduces anxiety and improves focus.

signals.title: Workplaces adopting email-free Fridays, mental health days, four-day workweek pilots in 2026
signals.summary: Organizations responding with four-day workweek pilots, mandatory mental health days, leadership training in psychological safety, and email-free Fridays. 78% of Americans prefer in-person social interactions to digital-only experiences. Top driver for Gen Z job stress: long working hours (48%), followed by lack of recognition (48%).

signals.title: MZ세대 직장인 66.5%가 워라밸을 괜찮은 일자리 판단 1순위로 선택
signals.summary: 괜찮은 일자리 판단 기준 묻는 질문에 응답자 66.5%가 '일과 삶의 균형이 맞춰지는 일자리' 선택. 한국은행 보고서에서 직업 선택 시 '근무여건' 고려 비중 31.5%로 '임금수준'(26.8%)을 제치고 1위. Z세대 32%, 밀레니얼 37%가 '일과 삶의 균형 능력'을 가장 선호하는 직장인 자질로 선택.

signals.title: Hybrid work becomes new default, full remote reserved for highly skilled technical roles
signals.summary: Hybrid work becoming new default with full-time remote opportunities increasingly rare and reserved for highly skilled technical roles. Two- to three-day office week will become expected norm for most white-collar office jobs. LinkedIn research indicates 70% of skills used in most jobs expected to change by 2030.

signals.title: AgeTech becomes fastest-growing healthcare innovation sector as aging in place movement booms
signals.summary: Aging in place movement giving rise to booming AgeTech market, sector dedicated to tools/technologies helping older adults live independently at home. One of fastest-growing areas in healthcare innovation representing billions of dollars. By 2030, all baby boomers will be 65+, about 1 in 5 residents retirement age.

signals.title: 2026 heralds return of connection as health pillar, community circles and wellness dinners rising
signals.summary: 2026 heralds return of connection as pillar of health with community circles, wellness dinners, hobby-based meetups, and restorative group rituals becoming more popular as people seek meaningful in-person relationships. Represents counter-trend to digital isolation and social media fatigue.

signals.title: Spiritual wellness apps market to grow from $2.89B in 2026 to $9.91B by 2035
signals.summary: Spiritual wellness apps market expected to grow from $2.89B in 2026 to $9.91B by 2035, with meditation and mindfulness apps dominating. AI being used for customized recommendations and community features. Integration with VR environments and wearable device compatibility enhancing engagement.

signals.title: People choosing spirituality over partying in 2026, seeking mental peace and deeper meaning
signals.summary: People choosing spirituality over partying in 2026 seeking mental peace, emotional balance, deeper meaning. Rising stress, anxiety, burnout made mindful practices more appealing. Social media normalized spirituality with viral devotional music, healing reels, influencer-led wellness journeys making spirituality feel modern.

signals.title: Sound healing and vagus nerve stimulation emerge as major wellness trends for 2026
signals.summary: Sound healing set to strike chord in 2026 involving immersion in sound of chimes, gongs, crystal bowls sending into relaxing meditative state. Focus on stimulating vagus nerve, key pathway in body's stress-regulation system. Sound baths, astrology sessions, moon ceremonies, star bathing making resurgence.

signals.title: Emotional fitness treated like physical fitness with breathwork and nervous system regulation
signals.summary: Emotional wellness becoming proactive and preventive, treated like physical fitness with breathwork and mind-body practices focused on nervous system regulation. Emotional fitness focuses on noticing stress earlier and responding with tools like mindfulness, journaling, breathwork, mood tracking.

signals.title: AI-powered meditation guides creating personalized practice with VR environments in 2026
signals.summary: Integration of meditation with advanced technologies including AI-driven personalization, wearable device compatibility, and VR environments enhancing user engagement. AI-powered meditation guides creating new possibilities for personalized practice. Mindfulness meditation application market experiencing rapid innovation.

signals.title: Victoria VR launches first Web3 metaverse on Apple Vision Pro with blockchain integration
signals.summary: Victoria VR attempting to merge Web3 and metaverse using Apple Vision Pro, representing one of first blockchain-based metaverse applications for platform. Game promises stunning graphics and immersive gameplay, taking advantage of Vision Pro capabilities alongside Web3 technology. Metaverse offers virtual lands as NFTs.

scan_notes.methodology: Systematic web search across STEEPS categories with focus on January 2026 developments and 3-day scan window (Jan 10-12)
scan_notes.coverage_assessment: Comprehensive coverage across all 6 STEEPS categories with strong representation in Technological (16 signals) and balanced distribution in other areas
notable_trends: Physical AI and humanoid robotics dominated CES 2026 as breakthrough technology
Quantum computing entering commercial viability phase with multiple companies announcing 2026 milestones
AI agent deployment transitioning from experimental to production-ready enterprise systems
Gen Z and millennials driving major workplace culture shifts prioritizing work-life balance over salary
Spirituality and wellness technology experiencing explosive market growth with AI personalization
US-China tech competition intensifying while selective trade cooperation continues
Renewable energy investment outpacing fossil fuels 2:1 globally
Direct air capture technology achieving commercial scale with cost reductions
scan_notes.data_quality: High - majority of signals from tier 1-2 sources with specific dates, metrics, and verifiable claims
scan_notes.future_monitoring: Track CES 2026 follow-up announcements, Q1 2026 venture capital deployment data, COP31 preparations, quantum computing commercial deployments, AI agent enterprise adoption rates
